column2: PWB: Freiday Foolishness Now With Fur And Feathers!
column5: Happee Freiday. Peeps!!  It’s been a week hasn’t it?  So kick off yer shoes put up yer feet and relax with us fur a while. I may not be here at posting time because………. Whoooooooooooooooooo and also……………...hoooooooooooooooo!!!!!!!!!!  So on that happy note let’s have a little celebrating up in here!  / You otter be happy that it’s Freiday! It’s going to be great to be close again!  boop! Oh by all means…….bring a fren’!! Relax...it ain’t dat kinda partay…...yet.  Wait till the chocklit gets handed owt!   Get ready!!!!  /  . ai gots da bag….ai just can’t get owt of it!!! Oh dear...are we gonna get rowdy??? culd ai hab dis dance please?? oh yes!!  But remember….ai am                                                                  a  .ai can’t dance but ai can play a tune!!! we’ll be the chorus!  we only sing the high notes... let’s get dis partay underway…..but first some selfies….. evvybuddy happee??    butterfly sez…..enuff is enuff fur naow.  whew!  we wuz gettin’ firsty wiff all dat dancin’!! I did promise chocklit…...  And what goes on after da chocklit comes owt….well…….you doan need to kno dat duz yuz?  heh Doan let da liddle wuns stay up too late….. Have a great weekend Peeps!!!  Be safe and well! Be like da raccoons……  WEAR A MASK….WASH YER PAWS!!!
